title: There’s No Such Thing as Love in a Swordsman’s Heart - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Martial Arts   Shounen Ai   Wuxia
tags: Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Famous Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Straight Seme   Straight Uke   Strong Love Interests   Sword Wielder   Transmigration
author: 一隻大雁
description:
Jiang Su transmigrated. 

He transmigrated into a BL harem novel as the novel’s main character, jianghu’s number one beauty, who bewitches the masses with just his face, then is subjected to shame, humiliation, and infamy at the end. 

To prevent this from happening, Jiang Su diligently practiced his swordsmanship. But then he suddenly realized…If he is still single when the original storyline ends, he will be forced to return to his original world. 

 Jiang Su: ……>
